PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff>"Special Skill Augmentation" has been
unlocked!</COL>
Just like the Skill Augmentation, by offering a
Blood Orb to the White Dragon, you can further
enhance the abilities of each job.
Some abilities can be obtained by meeting the
conditions at <COL ffdc78>"Epitaph Road"</COL> in
places like Fort Thines and other locations.

Furthermore, in Special Skill Augmentation, it
becomes possible to acquire the <COL ffdc78>Custom
Skill EX</COL>which lets existing custom skills be
strengthened.
There are two types of Custom Skill EX: <COL
ffdc78>Fortified</COL> and <COL
ffdc78>Technique</COL>, and the abilities that are
strengthened vary for each type.
Please note that there are equipment requirements
for Custom Skill EX. Once the base custom skill
reaches LV. 9, Technique can be equipped, and once
it reaches LV. 10, Fortified can be equipped.

TutorialTitleName:
Further growth of the Arisen, inheritance of
exquisite skills
